snippet: The company is planning a fairly low-key introduction for the latest model of its flagship phone, which has lost some of its staying power in recent years.
abstract: Samsung is planning fairly low-key introduction for the Galaxy S5, latest model of its flagship phone, which has lost some of its staying power.
lead_paragraph: The company is planning a fairly low-key introduction for the latest model of its flagship phone, which has lost some of its staying power in recent years.

headline.main: Samsung Reins In the Theatrics for Galaxy S5
headline.print_headline: Samsung Said to Tone Down Its Publicity for Galaxy S5
